drupalNodeEvent.title: Panel Discussion – Gaming with Chinese Characteristics

field_speakers.processed:
Heather Inwood (Cambridge University),
Nakamura Akinori (Ritsumeikan University),
Deng Jian (Peking University),
Zhu Jiayin (Founder/Editor of Chuapp),
David Der-wei Wang (Harvard University),
Yedong Sh-Chen (Harvard University)

field_organizers.processed: Harvard University Fairbank Center For Chinese Studies

field_description.processed: This panel is co-sponsored by the Harvard Provostial Fund for the Arts and Humanities and the Chiang Ching-kuo Foundation. It is a part of the “mediAsia: topics in media and area studies” event series.
